name: laminas/laminas-validator
description: Validation classes for a wide range of domains, and the ability to chain validators to create complex validation criteria

suggest.laminas/laminas-db: Laminas\Db component, required by the (No)RecordExists validator
suggest.laminas/laminas-filter: Laminas\Filter component, required by the Digits validator
suggest.laminas/laminas-i18n: Laminas\I18n component to allow translation of validation error messages
suggest.laminas/laminas-math: Laminas\Math component, required by the Csrf validator
suggest.laminas/laminas-servicemanager: Laminas\ServiceManager component to allow using the ValidatorPluginManager and validator chains
suggest.laminas/laminas-session: Laminas\Session component, ^2.8; required by the Csrf validator
suggest.laminas/laminas-uri: Laminas\Uri component, required by the Uri and Sitemap\Loc validators
suggest.psr/http-message: psr/http-message, required when validating PSR-7 UploadedFileInterface instances via the Upload and UploadFile validators
